1.Func_Description: Performs healthcheck for ip-in-ip encapsulated packets.
1.author: Qintian Huang

2.Func_Description: Same as decap_kern, it decaps the packet and pass it to the tcp/ip stack.
2.author: Qintian Huang

3.Func_Description: Input (struct xdp_md* ctx) is user accessible metadata for XDP packet hook
3.author: Qintian Huang

4.Read_maps: [ hc_ctrl_map, per_hckey_stats, hc_reals_map, hc_key_map, hc_stats_map, hc_pckt_macs,]
4.Func_Description: Input is user accessible mirror of in-kernel sk_buff
4.author: Qintian Huang

5.Func_Description: Check how many connection have been made within the last one second(or other
5.author: Nengneng Yu

6.Input: (struct packet_description *pckt, __u8 *protocol, __u64 off, __u16 *pkt_bytes, void *data, void *data_end, bool is_ipv6)
6.Func_Description: Process layer 3 headers. Drop the packet if it is 1)bogus packet, len less than minimum ethernet frame size, 2)fragmented, 3)ipv4 header not equals to 20 bytes,
6.author: Qintian Huang
